details:
Code is capable of exfiltrating files from a given folder, but requires supplying with the Telegram token etc., what isn't included in the package. Names are hiding the real functionality


---

Category: HIGHLY_SUSPICIOUS - Packages that are likely malicious, but due to the obfuscation level, lack of time or clear indicators it's hard to say what exactly they do; the highest risk of false positives.
Campaign: 2025-03-spotek
